OOC: Since no one has suggested anything in terms of what the destroyed base 
looks like, im thinking it up myself

::Bludgeon walks through the old, ruined base.  The autoguns were thrashed, 
and the walls were beginning to deteriorate.  It would take a lot of hard 
labor to fix this.  He flies back to the other preds::
Bludgeon: Well, i believe a relocation is in order.  Unless, any of you have 
come up with something while i was gone?
